Reviews.Title: Antiquated and Slooooow.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Jarod"
Reviews.Content: Older Android version, too many junky apps and not enough RAM. I had one die and returned it to my cell provider hoping that this obsolete piece of junk would be worth a credit for upgrade. Unfortunately, they just gave me another one.Pros:-makes calls-takes an micro-SD card--Micro USB makes it easy to charge with standard chargers-OK camera-OK music playerCons:-Apps are old versions that auto-upgrade and make the phone virtually unusable.-Slow.-Not enough RAm to support what was factory installed, forget about using a bunch of other apps.

Reviews.Title: An okay phone
Reviews.Author: W. A. Harrell
Reviews.Content: This is the second phone from this manufacturer.  I'm a stockholder and therefore biased.  The phone is inexpensive, and meets my needs.  I'm sure my children--who text constantly--wouldn't want this phone.
